data: Rishav Mazumdar currently resides in Dhanbad, Jharkhand, India and is pursuing his Bachelors in The Undergraduate Programme in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Indian Institute of Information Technology, Ranchi.
Skilled in web development ( developed web applications using NodeJS and PHP ) along with the experience of working with SQL databases .
Likes competitive programming, a quick learner having a good grasp on python programming, OOP and DSA concepts.
